short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A new-tab visualization of how many Sundays are remaining in your life

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Life moves way too fast and we often don't realize how little time we have left.
So discover the remaining time in your life with each new tab!

This browser extension presents a visual representation of the Sundays remaining in your life  (assuming life expectancy of 80 years). Its purpose is to prompt reflection on the finite nature of time and the importance of not squandering it. 

Hopefully every glance at your new tab helps you take action and take full advantage of the days, weeks, and months ahead - instead of being lost in the rush of day-to-day life. 

Additionally, you have the option to record your accomplishments thus far and outline future aspirations. This feature acts as a source of inspiration during moments of doubt or apathy. 

Inspired by Paras Chopra.
